parameters.content:
# ðŸŽ¯ Lead Qualification & Nurturing System

Auto-captures JotForm leads, scores them by AI, and sends hot leads to sales, others to marketing. All leads go to HubSpot and Google Sheets, with Slack alerts and auto follow-up email.

**Scoring:** Based on email, company size, budget, and timeline.

**Setup:**  
- Connect JotForm, HubSpot, Sheets, Slack, SMTP  
- Map fields  
- Adjust score logic and email templates

**Results:**  
- Respond faster, convert more, eliminate manual entry

*Built by Daniel Shashko*  
[Connect on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-shashko/)
